plot: Through a view of the microcosm of a small village in rural Castile, this doc unfolds a cinematographer's vision of the recent controversy in Spain over the official version of the history of the General Franco era.
title: El fin de la espera
plot_es: Through a view of the microcosm of a small village in rural Castile, this doc unfolds a cinematographer's vision of the recent controversy in Spain over the official version of the history of the General Franco era.
plot_en: Through a view of the microcosm of a small village in rural Castile, this doc unfolds a cinematographer's vision of the recent controversy in Spain over the official version of the history of the General Franco era.
